lead_paragraph: Ukraine team mates Andriy Yarmolenko and Taras Stepanenko have been involved in a club fracas that could undermine their country's chances at the European Championship next month.

headline.print_headline: Derby Fracas May Threaten Ukraine's Euro 2016 Chances
headline.main: Derby Fracas May Threaten Ukraine's Euro 2016 Chances
